text: 30 Minutes or Less is a 2011 action-comedy-crime movie that was produced by Stuart Cornfeld, Ben Stiller and Jeremy Kramer and was directed by Ruben Fleischer. 30 Minutes or Less was released on August 12, 2011 in North America. The movie received mixed reviews with a 45% rating on Rotten Tomatoes and a 51 out of 100 from Metacritic. == Cast == * Jesse Eisenberg as Nick * Danny McBride as Dwayne * Aziz Ansari as Chet * Nick Swardson as Travis * Michael Pe√±a as Chongo * Fred Ward as The Major * Dilshad Vadsaria as Katie * Mya Rajah as Amelia * Bianca Kajlich as Juici * Brett Gelman as Nick's Boss == Other websites == *30 Minutes or Less Official website * Category:2011 crime movies Category:2011 comedy movies Category:2010s criminal comedy movies Category:American action movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:Multilingual movies Category:Movies directed by Ruben Fleischer Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: 30 Minutes or Less
